===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/pentau/}} → {{IPAchar|/fentau/}} → {{IPAchar|/hentau/}} → {{IPAchar|/hentɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/hentoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=へんとう}} compound {{m|zh|扁桃|tr=pen<sup>X</sup> daw|lit=flat, thin + peach}}, from the way the [[almond]] [[fruit]] resembles a flat, thin [[peach]].

The modern sense of {{m|en|tonsil}} came about by contraction from the full term {{m|ja|扁桃腺|tr=hentōsen|lit=almond gland}}.
